formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Future Value Formula: FV = P \times \left(1 + \frac{r}{n}\right)^{nt} Where P is the principal investment amount, r is the annual interest rate, n is the number of times that interest is compounded per year, and t is the number of years the money is invested for.

variables.meaning: property tax (annual or monthly depending on input)

changes: Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
